author: aadamchik
msg: CAY-792: Date has issues with different locales when using XMLEncoder/XMLDecoder - applied patch with some cleanup and backwards compatibility checks

author: azeez
msg: A node which receive a GetStateCommand should refrain from replying, if the receiver itself has not still initialized.
The reqeuster will randomly select another node and request the state. However, after trying several times unsuccessfully,
the requester has to break out of the loop and continue to initialize itself.

author: ffang
msg: [CXF-680] rest binding support input class without @XmlRootElement

author: andreas
msg: Converted 'About Lenya' page to usecase. This makes it independent from proxying. See bug 42050 for more information.
